passages.text: [[What's going on here?]]
passages.name: Angela Approaches The Guards

passages.text:
"Sorry ma'am, park's condemned. Never actually opened in the first place." 
[[Can I go in?]]
passages.name: What's going on here?

passages.text:
"No ma'am, authorized personnel only"

[[Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.]]
[[I need to take a look around, can I please go in?]]

links.name: Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.
links.link: Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.

links.name: I need to take a look around, can I please go in?
links.link: I need to take a look around, can I please go in?

passages.name: Can I go in?

passages.text:
"Pfft yeah right, you're not even in uniform! Come back with ID or something and we can talk."
[[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.

passages.text:
"And I need a drink, so I guess we're both disappointed tonight sweetheart."
[[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: I need to take a look around, can I please go in?

passages.text:
(if:Police Uniform)[[[Play Pretend->Play Pretend]]]
(if:Fake ID)[[[Flash Fake ID->Show it to the guards]]]
[[Talk to the guards again]]
passages.name: Look around for clues

passages.text:
"You again? I thought you'd fucked off"
[[I'll leave soon, I just wanted to ask what's up with this place?]]
[[I just need to borrow a pen real quick->I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick]]
[[(Lie), I am, I just need my uhhh jacket, I think the wind blew it over the fence.]]
[[Sorry, I was just going - leave->Talk to the guards again]]

links.name: I'll leave soon, I just wanted to ask what's up with this place?
links.link: I'll leave soon, I just wanted to ask what's up with this place?

links.name: I just need to borrow a pen real quick
links.link: I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick

links.name: (Lie), I am, I just need my uhhh jacket, I think the wind blew it over the fence.
links.link: (Lie), I am, I just need my uhhh jacket, I think the wind blew it over the fence.

links.name: Sorry, I was just going - leave

passages.name: Talk to the guards again

passages.text:
"It's a crime scene is all you need to know, now please ma'am, move along."
[[Next]]
passages.name: I'll leave soon, I just wanted to ask what's up with this place?

passages.text:
"Sure, here ya go."
*ANGELA RECIEVES A PEN*
[[Thanks, I'll be going now. - leave->Talk to the guards again]]

links.name: Thanks, I'll be going now. - leave

passages.name: I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick

passages.text: [[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: Sorry, I was just going - leave

passages.text: [[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: Right, I'll be going now - leave

passages.text:
*Angela flashes the fake ID which now claims her as a municipal safety inspector*
[[Next 2]]
passages.name: Show it to the guards

passages.text:
"Didn't have 'get past cops' on my to-do list, but I have a feeling things are gonna keep gettin weirder the more I try to figure out what the hell is going on."
[[End Dialogue]]
passages.name: Enter the park

passages.text:
"How do you do fellow officers? I am here for a shift change."
[[Next 4]]
passages.name: Play Pretend

passages.text:
"Don't gotta tell me twice, good luck.
[[Next 6]]
passages.name: Positive, I'd enjoy the time off if I were you

passages.text:
"What? The wind blew your jacket over the fence? Did you really think that would work?"
[[Next 1]]
passages.name: (Lie), I am, I just need my uhhh jacket, I think the wind blew it over the fence.

passages.text:
"Great. Cops, a fence, a gate. Why can't the door ever just be open?" 

[[Next box]]
passages.name: Introduction

passages.text:
"Crime scene? Ha! Yeah some crime scene, a fuckin' clown got turned into jelly a year ago and now we gotta freeze our asses off so nobody can see the splat mark."
[[Next Box]]
passages.name: Next

passages.text:
"*Sigh* All you need to know, ma'am, is that it's a crime scene, and it's closed."

[[Right, I'll be going now - leave]]

links.name: Right, I'll be going now - leave
links.link: Right, I'll be going now - leave

passages.name: Next Box

passages.text:
"Sorry, we can't let you in. You can check the lost and found bin if you want, maybe you can find a replacement." 
[[Right, I'll be going now - leave]]

links.name: Right, I'll be going now - leave
links.link: Right, I'll be going now - leave

passages.name: Next 1

passages.text:
"Municipal Safety Inspector? Woof and I thought I had a shit job."
[[Next 3]]
passages.name: Next 2

passages.text:
"Go on through ma'am, and be careful, this place wasn't exactly well built."
[[Enter the park]]
passages.name: Next 3

passages.text: If you see this tell Luke... please don't see this.
passages.name: End Dialogue

passages.text:
"Bout fuckin' time! Ten more minutes and I would've frozen to that chair."
[[Next 5]]
passages.name: Next 4

passages.text:
"Huh, earlier than usual, you sure this is right?"
[[Positive, I'd enjoy the time off if I were you]]

links.name: Positive, I'd enjoy the time off if I were you
links.link: Positive, I'd enjoy the time off if I were you

passages.name: Next 5

passages.text:
*Sigh* "Gotta get through somehow."

[[Angela Approaches The Guards]]
passages.name: Next box

passages.text:
Safe watch, ma'am.

*The two guards gather their things and leave their post to Angela* 
[[Enter the park]]
passages.name: Next 6
